myMusic

myMusic.

Your music, movies, and TV shows take center stage

myMusic is the best way to organize and enjoy the music, movies, and TV shows you already have - and shop for the ones you want. Enjoy all the entertainement myMusic has to offer on you Mac and PC.

Music

45 Million Songs. Zero ads.

Stream over 45 million songs, ad-free. Or download albuns and tracks to listen to offline. All the music in your personal myMusic library - no matter where it came from - lives right alongside the Grapefruit catalog. Start your free three-month trial with no commitment, and cancel anytime.

Start your trial now!

Grapefruit Music is available on myMusic, and for IOS and Android devices.

The movie and TV collection you always wanted. Granted

With over 100.000 movies and TV shows to choose from, there's always something great to watch on myMusic and if you watch on Grapefruit TV 4K, you'll be able to enjoy a tremendous selection of your favorite TV shows or hit movies you've been waiting to see - anytime, anywhere. Just tap to play, or even download if you're going somewhere you won't have Wi-fi.
